snippet: The former All-Star catcher Ramon Hernandez agreed to a minor league contract with the Kansas City Royals.
abstract: Former All-Star catcher Ramon Hernandez agrees to minor league contract with Kansas City Royals.
lead_paragraph: The former All-Star catcher Ramon Hernandez agreed to a minor league contract with the Kansas City Royals.

headline.main: Ex-All Star Catcher Gets Deal With Royals
